articles.description: Yo-Yo Ma played the cello while wearing a mask and sitting on a plastic chair at the Berkshire Community College in Massachusetts during his post-shot 15-minute observation period on Saturday.
articles.content:
Receiving a second COVID vaccine dose is often a cause for celebration and, in one Massachusetts clinic, legendary cellist Yo-Yo Ma marked the occasion with a surprise recital.
Ma was pictured playi… [+3900 chars]
